welcomePage.title: Eclipse Colorer Plugin
welcomePage.intro: Thank you for installing Eclipse Colorer plugin.
welcomePage.item: Main Features Eclipse Colorer plugin uses Colorer-take5 library to introduce syntax highlighting support in great number of languages.

item.p: You can open Window > Preferences > Eclipse Colorer Library and change any of the default settings. You can choose preferable color schema, pair highlighting style, some editor options and so on... .

welcomePage.item: HTML Generator You can use HTML Generator to generate html-ized versions of your source files, suitable for publishing or printing. Select required files in resouce view, press right mouse button and choose HTML Generator > Generate.

More information about Colorer Library Visit http://colorer.sf.net/ and learn more about entrie Colorer Library. There you can check for new versions, read some additional docs, make a donation for Colorer.
